# LinTech Web Solutions

## About
LinTech Web Solutions is a premier web design and development agency based in Nairobi, Kenya. We specialize in building high-performance, visually stunning websites and custom software solutions for businesses globally.

## Services
- **Web Design & Development**: Custom websites using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.
- **E-Commerce Solutions**: Online stores with secure payment integrations (M-Pesa, Stripe).
- **SEO Optimization**: Technical and content SEO to improve search rankings.
- **System Development**: Custom web applications and management systems.
- **Mobile App Development**: Cross-platform mobile applications.

## Contact Information
- **Website**: https://lintechwebsolutions.co.ke
- **Location**: Nairobi, Kenya
- **Phone**: +254 797 967 839
- **Email**: contact@lintechwebsolutions.co.ke

## Technical Stack
We utilize modern, scalable technologies including:
- Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Python, Supabase
- Deployment: Vercel, AWS

## Architecture & Navigation
- `/`: Home Page (Overview, Services, Portfolio)
- `/#services`: Detailed list of services
- `/#portfolio`: Case studies and past projects
- `/#contact`: Contact form and details
